title: Flying Knife
info: The Flying Knife is a unique Hardmode melee weapon dropped by the Hallowed Mimic. It throws a reusable cursor-controllable projectile similar to the Magic Missile mechanic, though more erratic and with no mana cost. Like boomerangs, the projectile returns to the player.
